label: ABC2D5_oP36_55_g_g_adh_3g2h-001
title: Ludwigite (Mg$_{2}$FeBO$_{5}$) Structure
comments:
The stoichiometry of the metallic atoms should not be taken as exact, {\em e.g.}, the actual composition of the reference compound is Mg$_{1.76}$Fe$_{1.22}$Al$_{0.02}$BO$_{5}$. (Irwin, 1999) 
 The Mg-I (2a) site has the composition Mg$_{0.99}$Fe$_{0.01}$, the Mg-II (2d) site Fe$_{0.557}$Mg$_{0.443}$, the Mg-III (2g) site Mg$_{0.99}$Fe$_{0.01}$, and the Fe-I (4h) site Fe$_{0.92}$Al$_{0.08}$.
